version_description: - Bug fixes: crash on rendering large projects, a few other crashes
- Bug fixes: crash on rendering large projects, a few other crashes

- Can set volume buttons to undo/redo or flip back/forward
- Bug fixes

RoughAnimator is now available for Windows!

- Can set volume buttons to undo/redo or flip back/forward
- Bug fixes

RoughAnimator is now available for Windows!

- Bug fix: crash when creating or editing project on some older devices
- Bug fix: crash when exporting to Photo library in iOS 11

- Bug fix: crash when creating or editing project on some older devices
- Bug fix: crash when exporting to Photo library in iOS 11

- Edit multiple drawings at once
- Timeline can be zoomed out further
- Bug fix: Apple Pencil pressure sensitivity problems
- Bug fix: canvas rotation didn't work

- Edit multiple drawings at once
- Timeline can be zoomed out further
- Bug fix: Apple Pencil pressure sensitivity problems
- Bug fix: canvas rotation didn't work

- Adjust interface scale in app preferences
- Option to use two finger tap to undo, three finger tap to redo
- Merge layers
- “Draw inside” option (preserves transparency)
- Set shape for brush tool and erase tool independently
- Changing layer opacity is undoable
- Bug fix: fill tolerance didn’t work
- Bug fix: right arrow keyboard shortcut crashed

- Adjust interface scale in app preferences
- Option to use two finger tap to undo, three finger tap to redo
- Merge layers
- “Draw inside” option (preserves transparency)
- Set shape for brush tool and erase tool independently
- Changing layer opacity is undoable
- Bug fix: fill tolerance didn’t work
- Bug fix: right arrow keyboard shortcut crashed

- Import multiple images as sequence (requires iOS 11 or higher)
- Reduced drawing lag at beginning of stroke
- Faster loading
- Bug fix: crash on importing video
- Bug fix: failed to move exported video to iCloud Drive

- Import multiple images as sequence (requires iOS 11 or higher)

- Bug fix: crash on importing video

- Pinch to zoom timeline
- Transform handles are visible outside canvas
- Improved audio scrubbing
- Supports Apple Pencil 2 double-tap actions

- Improved GIF export with less flickering of colors

- Project list has thumbnails
- Increased height limit to 1920
- Minor bug fixes
